done.text:
Successfully completed the Shopping List form creation in Notion!

**Task Summary:**
‚úì Navigated to Notion (https://www.notion.so)
‚úì Created a new form structure
‚úì Renamed the form to "Shopping List"
‚úì Added household items to the form

**Form Details:**
The Shopping List form has been created with the following structure:

1. **Form Title:** Shopping List

2. **Question 1 - Item Name:** 
   - Type: Text field
   - Purpose: Allows users to enter the name of household items they need

3. **Question 2 - Household Item:**
   - Type: Multiple choice (select up to 1)
   - Categories added:
     ‚Ä¢ Cleaning Supplies
     ‚Ä¢ Food & Groceries
     ‚Ä¢ Personal Care

**Location:** The form is saved in your Notion workspace under "Pranav's" > Private > "My New Note" page.

**Access:** The form is configured so that only members at Pranav's workspace can fill it out.

The form is now ready to use for tracking household shopping items. Users can enter item names and categorize them by type for better organization.
